stepA.title: 20-Minute Deep Scan
stepA.details:
Scan 12 months of bank statements and app store history.
Ignore one-time purchases.
Extract ONLY recurring charges.

stepB.title: Annual Subscription Inventory
stepB.prompt: List every recurring charge you found. Include monthly cost if visible.

steps.title: Identify the Dominant Leak Pattern
steps.details:
Most people bleed money in predictable psychological ways.
Which pattern dominates?

steps.title: Identity Leak Diagnosis
steps.prompt: Which subscriptions represent who you *wish* you were rather than how you actually live?

steps.title: Inertia Leak Diagnosis
steps.prompt: Which subscriptions survived purely because you didn't act?

steps.title: Avoidance Leak Diagnosis
steps.prompt: Which services felt annoying to cancel, so you paid instead?

steps.details: This rule will govern future subscriptions automatically.
